casebody.data:
Farzad SAM, Plaintiff—Appellant, v. ROCKWELL HUD SYSTEMS INC., Delaware Corporation; Kaiser Flight Dynamics Inc., a Delaware Corporation, dba Flight Dynamics, Defendants—Appellees. Kambiz Ghahreman, Plaintiff—Appellant, v. Rockwell Hud Systems Inc.; Kaiser Flight Dynamics Inc., Defendants—Appellees. Nos. 01-35015, 01-35016. D.C. Nos. CV-99-01749-KI, CV 00-00077-KI. United States Court of Appeals, Ninth Circuit. Argued and Submitted July 12, 2002. Decided July 24, 2002.

Before GOODWIN, T.G. NELSON, and W. FLETCHER, Circuit Judges.

ORDER*

The judgment appealed from is affirmed for the reasons stated in the opinion granting summary judgment by District Judge King.

AFFIRMED.

This disposition is not appropriate for publication and may not be cited to or by the courts of this circuit except as may be provided by Ninth Circuit Rule 36-3.
